title: Strategic Use of Curriculum Analysis Tools Based on Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and experience using digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners are assessed on mathematics curriculum design capabilities through project-based evaluation in an environment enabling real-time data analysis with digital devices

learning_goals: Learner achievement data in mathematics curricula can be systematically collected using curriculum analysis tools.
A process can be designed to derive curriculum improvement directions based on collected data.
Strategies can be established for the integrated operation of microlearning content and analytics tools in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
